name: Crazy Hunger Puzzle Adventure
description:
Crazy hunger puzzle is the best adventure game. Avoid the obstacle and hurdles to win this territory. You have to use the walls for your safety and hide yourself behind these walls. Different challenging mission with best 2d game. Crazy hunger always try to find his prey. A physics based brain usage game with fully entertainment. I thought this crazy adventure hunger puzzle is the addictive adventure game. This is the totally brain exercise action game with an amazing fun play. A modern user friendly game with an easy to play features. Move your hero is this simple and addictive game to create fun and adventure.
Your hero is crazy and your task is to eat everything without colliding obstacle. There is a big moving stone type looking live thing is in your way. This living giant thing is behind you. Run and escape from your giant enemy and eat your food in front of your path. Use brain and cheat him into maze walls. When you hoaxer him into network of walls then you can easily eat your food. Don’t try to touch him with crazy hunger otherwise your mission will be failed. Run behind the maze walls and win this crazy hunger challenge. When you unlock the next levels the number of your enemies will be increased and game will be more interesting. You job is to eat food, get energy and run until death.
